overview.description: Goa, located on India's western coast, is renowned for its beaches, Portuguese-influenced architecture, and vibrant nightlife. Established as a state on May 30, 1987, it attracts millions with its unique blend of culture and relaxation.

top_destinations.name: Calangute Beach
top_destinations.description: One of Goa's most popular beaches with water sports and nightlife.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit in the evening; try water sports.

top_destinations.name: Panaji
top_destinations.description: The charming capital with colonial architecture and the Mandovi River.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Take a river cruise; explore Fontainhas.

top_destinations.name: Old Goa
top_destinations.description: A UNESCO site with historic churches like Basilica of Bom Jesus.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Wear comfortable shoes; visit Se Cathedral.

accommodation.name: The Leela Goa
accommodation.description: Premium resort with stunning sea views.

culinary_delights.name: Fisherman’s Wharf
culinary_delights.description: Famous for fresh seafood and Goan dishes.

culinary_delights.name: Viva Panjim
culinary_delights.description: Authentic Goan cuisine in a cozy setting.

culinary_delights.name: The Black Sheep Bistro
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of international dishes.

culinary_delights.name: Ritz Classic
culinary_delights.description: Known for North Indian and tandoori.

must_visit_spots.name: Anjuna Beach
must_visit_spots.description: Famous for its flea market and sunset views.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit on Wednesdays for the market.

must_visit_spots.name: Dudhsagar Falls
must_visit_spots.description: A majestic waterfall surrounded by lush forests.
must_visit_spots.tip: Take a train ride for the best view.

must_visit_spots.name: Fort Aguada
must_visit_spots.description: A historic Portuguese fort overlooking the Arabian Sea.
must_visit_spots.tip: Explore early morning for fewer crowds.

must_visit_spots.name: Basilica of Bom Jesus
must_visit_spots.description: A UNESCO site housing St. Francis Xavier's relics.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit during Christmas for a festive vibe.

must_visit_spots.name: Palolem Beach
must_visit_spots.description: A serene beach ideal for relaxation and dolphin spotting.
must_visit_spots.tip: Stay for the night to enjoy bioluminescent waters.

must_visit_spots.name: Chapora Fort
must_visit_spots.description: A scenic fort featured in Bollywood films.
must_visit_spots.tip: Hike up for a panoramic view.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Panaji is 600 km from Mumbai (NH66, 12-14 hrs). By train: Madgaon Junction connects major cities. By air: Dabolim Airport (Goa).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry sunscreen; book accommodations in advance.
